EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451PivotalPushesBoundariesWithGPDB5_AR_Q317.Download
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the report!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the 451 Research report, Pivotal Pushes Boundaries with Latest Version of Greenplum Database. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
For more analyst resources related to Pivotal data solutions check out:
- Gartner Critical Capabilities for Data Management Solutions for Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-critical-capabilities-for-data-management-solutions-for-analytics]]>
- Analytical Innovation: How to Build the Next Generation Data Platform Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/analytical-innovation-how-to-build-the-next-generation-data-platform]]>
- Five Pitfalls When Operationalizing Data Science and a Strategy for Success Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/aug-2-operationalizing-data-science-five-common-pitfalls-and-a-strategy-for-success]]>
- Microservices Approaches for Continuous Data Integration Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/microservices-approaches-for-continuous-data-integration]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization in transforming the way it builds software, please contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
